name: Omnichronic v2 prototype
description:
This is a prototype/demo for the second version of Omnichronic.

It's been along time since i've update anything regarding the Omnichronic project after it was given a graphical overhaul and turned into a half pixel, half voxel 2,5D/Paper Mario-graphical style instead of a classic 2d adventure game.

This is a demo made a while back to submit to some competitions/conventions but nothing came of it. 

The game is still in development but progress is slow as this is a hobby/passion project and i have alot of other things on my plate at the same time.
